title.rendered: 2019 Brand New Conference: Summary, Sights, and Videos

content.rendered:
Here is this year’s breakdown of the 16 sessions of the 2019 Brand New Conference that took place this past October 17 – 18 in Las Vegas, NV, and which was awesome. (If you are looking at this in an RSS reader head on over to the real thing, too much heavy formatting). This is a very long post with a photo of each speaker, very brief summaries, and a preview of their video/session, so give it a good time to load. A few other things worth bullet-pointing:

  • Videos for purchase are now available.
  • A lot more photos from the event have been posted in this Flickr album.
  • Registration is now open for the 2020 Brand New Conference in Austin, TX on October 22 – 23.
  • Next week, most likely, I will post this year’s identity materials.

All event photos by Sofia Negron. (On the grid images you can click to open a bigger version.)

Day 1: Registration

Day 1: Morning Welcome and Materials Behind-the-scenes

Day 1: Early Morning Speakers

Pum Lefebure / Design Army

A behind-the-scenes look at the painstaking attention to detail of Design Army’s stunning brand campaign videos.

Video Preview

BUY VIDEO

Felix Fernando Oliha / Goodness Gracious

A thoughtful reconciliation of what we do as creatives and its relationship to the concept of “Belief”.

Video Preview

BUY VIDEO

Day 1: Morning Break

Day 1: Pro-bono-focused, 15-minute Presentations

Allyson Lack / Principle

A sobering insight into teen substance abuse and the glimmer of hope provided by Archway Academy in Houston.

Video Preview

FREE VIDEO

Deroy Peraza / Hyperakt

A quick intro into what doing work for non-profits followed by a look into the renaming and redesign of Tuyo Media.

Video Preview

FREE VIDEO

Mary Atwater / Young Survival Coalition

An introduction to YSC, a non-profit for young women diagnosed with breast cancer, and the help they need to continue their work.

Video Preview

FREE VIDEO

Day 1: Late Morning Speaker

Diti Katona / Concrete Design

A breakdown of three projects from Concrete that cover a runaway success, a potential success, and a failure.

Video Preview

BUY VIDEO

Day 1: Lunch

Day 1: Early Afternoon Speakers

Kawal Oberoi / Kawal Oberoi

A very entertaining overview of his still-young journey as a graphic designer, brand consultant, and podcaster in India.

Video Preview

BUY VIDEO

Kati Forner / Kati Forner Design

An inspirational case of evolving a career from working for agencies to establishing an independent, flourishing practice.

Video Preview

BUY VIDEO

Day 1: Afternoon Break

Day 1: Late Afternoon Speakers

Ritesh Gupta / Pet Plate

An appetizer of Pet Plate’s redesign leads to the main entrée of a breakdown of the current state of the design industry.

Video Preview

BUY VIDEO

Alfredo E., Bruno C., Matti V., Marcelo J. / Pupila

A riotously funny as well as solemnly serious glimpse at the personal and client projects that Pupila tackles with pure joy.

Video Preview

BUY VIDEO

Day 1: Summary

Day 2: Early-morning Vibes

Day 2: Morning Welcome and Brand New (the Blog) Summary

Day 2: Early Morning Speakers

Amy & Jennifer Hood / Hoodzpah

A lively presentation on the four equations that have led the Hood sisters to grow and evolve their business and practice.

Video Preview

BUY VIDEO

Steff Geissbühler / geissbühler:design

A look back at a 40-plus-year career, still going strong, and the iconic logos Steff has left in its wake.

Video Preview

BUY VIDEO

Day 2: Morning Break

Day 2: Pro-bono-focused, 15-minute Presentations

Elise Cropsal / lg2

A great example of thinking beyond the brief to create something the client, and its audience, didn’t know they wanted.

Video Preview

FREE VIDEO

Alex Coyle / SPARK

A look at how a side project for Spark to help a non-profit turned into a company-wide, year-round initiative to do good in different ways.

Video Preview

FREE VIDEO

Lolah Mupotaringa / Girl Pride Africa

A heartfelt introduction to Girl Pride Africa, a non-profit that helps young single mothers, and the help they need to continue their work.

Video Preview

FREE VIDEO

Day 2: Late Morning Speaker

Tarek Atrissi / Tarek Atrissi Design

An insightful glimpse into identity design for the Arab world through a practice that spans calligraphy, lettering, and type design.

Video Preview

BUY VIDEO

Day 2: Lunch

Day 2: Early Afternoon Speakers

Ana Couto / Ana Couto

An overview of the firm’s four principles and how they have evolved since 1991 along with the branding industry in Brazil.

Video Preview

BUY VIDEO

Mitch Paone / DIA

A visually stimulating presentation about how DIA blends music, movement, and type into kinetic identities.

Video Preview

BUY VIDEO

Day 2: Afternoon Break

Day 2: Late Afternoon Speakers

Louise Fili / Louise Fili Ltd.

A delightfully wry overview of Fili’s endlessly vast and amazingly rich work for New York’s restaurant industry.

Video Preview

BUY VIDEO

Forest Young / Wolff Olins

An in-depth behind the scenes look, charmingly presented, of Uber’s identity redesign, including first-round ideas.

Video Preview

BUY VIDEO

Day 2: Summary

Day 2: After-party

Attendee Impressions

View this post on Instagram

I needed this ✨ #bnconf

A post shared by Lauren Castro (@castrolauren) on Oct 19, 2019 at 5:39am PDT

View this post on Instagram

Last week, our design team headed to Las Vegas for the @bnconf. We spent two days listening to some incredible speakers who shared insights, learnings, processes, stories, and so much more. We were reminded to continue pushing our work and to always seek inspiration around us. We’re already looking forward to next year! #bnconf #takeaways #designarmy #inspo

A post shared by Honey (@workbyhoney) on Oct 26, 2019 at 9:20am PDT

View this post on Instagram

The catalyst for our trip ??✈️?? Another great @bnconf ??‍? 2 days of inspiring speakers and creative thinkers. Thank you @arminvit & @bryonygp Bring on 2020 in Austin, Texas! ? • #bnconf #vegas #lasvegas #brandnew #design #graphicdesign #threefourleft #wearetom #conference #underconsideration #neonlights

A post shared by Brad (@b_radgeorgelawrence) on Oct 24, 2019 at 2:54am PDT


View this post on Instagram

I had an amazing time at @bnconf! There’s so many great things I could tell y’all, but I just decided to highlight a few quotes and some super cool design heroes who are now friends that I got to hang out with! @arminvit @bryonygp if you want to throw the journey of a 20 year old self-taught brand designer with 6 years of experience in next year’s mix hit me up ? . . . . . #bnconf #lasvegas #branding #branddesign #branddesigner #brand #brandidentity #logodesign #logo #minimalist #bnconf2019 #identitydesign #design #ladesigner

A post shared by ???? ????? (@levidjones) on Oct 21, 2019 at 10:45am PDT

View this post on Instagram

Super inspired by @bnconf this week. Anyone else attended? I miss you guys, my insta lettering community. Might just start posting design work again. #bnconf #workinsta #design #inspired #lasvegas #brandnewconference #designnerd #reflections #branding

A post shared by Tanya Yeremeyeva (@tanye_type) on Oct 19, 2019 at 12:03pm PDT

View this post on Instagram

First trip to Vegas to attend my first ever @bnconf was a success! So much color and liveliness in Sin City ????????? Saw a lot, learned a lot, ate a lot, and was overwhelmed a lot ? but couldn’t be more grateful for the experience. Until next time ✈️

A post shared by Erica Gramm ? (@egramm13) on Oct 19, 2019 at 11:36am PDT


View this post on Instagram

Thank you @bnconf for such an amazing, inspiring, empowering, and uplifting experience! I have learned so much in just two days. As a design student, I felt so lucky to be in the audiences, to be surrounded by amazing creative minds, more importantly, to be learned and taught by inspiring speakers. BIG THANKS to all of the speakers, you inspire me in so many ways. Again, thank you Bryony and Armin for all the hard work and creativity that you put in on organizing and hosting the conference (Cheers to the 10th anniversary!) I promise I’ll be in Austin next year no matter wherever I’ll be on earth. I’ll fly all the way to Austin for another amazing #BNCONF 🙂 — Sincerely, P.

A post shared by PATCHANIT (@19theory) on Oct 23, 2019 at 9:26am PDT

View this post on Instagram

After winning tickets to attend the @bnconf I traveled to fabulous Las Vegas last week. It was inspiring to hear so many designers talk about their practices and approaches. Perhaps my favorite was @thekawaloberoi, because of the passion and sincerity in his work.

A post shared by jjjjustin (@jjjjustin) on Oct 22, 2019 at 7:51pm PDT

View this post on Instagram

Viva Las Vegas! This past week, Carlin, one of our designers, took on Vegas and the Brand New Conference. It was a star-studded event packed with lots of tips, tricks, and inspiration that we look forward to utilizing soon!

A post shared by Xdesign, Inc. (@xdesigninc) on Oct 22, 2019 at 11:49am PDT



BNConf 2020: Austin, TX

The 2020 Brand New Conference is scheduled for October 22 – 23 at the Long Center. Pre-sale tickets available now. See you there?
